full_summary:
**Multiple Village Class Spares: Baring, pipe fittings, and valves**
=================================================================
### Solicitation Information
* **Title**: Multiple Village Class Spares
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01016518
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-231056/A
* **Publication Date**: December 16, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 8, 2023 @ 14:00:00 EST

### Procurement Information
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Scope of Work
The Department of National Defence is seeking to procure various spares for the Village Class submarines, including bearings, pipe fittings, and valves. The delivery locations are CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

| **Item Number** | **Description** | **Quantity** | **Unit of Issue** | **Delivery Location** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 001 | Ball Bearing, Annular | 12/ea | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 002 | Ball Bearing, Annular | 12/ea | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 003 | Ball Bearing, Annular | 25/ea | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 004 | Ball Bearing, Annular | 25/ea | EA | CFB Halifax |
| ...   | ...                    | ...     | ...       | ...             |

### Documents and Attachments
The solicitation document and annex A can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/16/627a7992b1288ff38460305645f02961/w8482-231056-a-_rfp.pdf) website.

### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Zhang, Tiehan
* **Email**: tiehan.zhang@forces.gc.ca
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Additional Information
This solicitation is open to all suppliers who meet the qualification criteria. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
